overview: During the magical weekend of 27, 28 and 29 July 2012 more than 180,000 visitors attended one of the most beautiful and talked about festivals in world. The 8th edition of Tomorrowland was one that would never be forgotten. An amazing festival, a magic location, wonderful decor, more than 400 artists and byfar the best public in the world! You can relive all of this now with the Tomorrowland after movie 2012.
tagline: Yesterday is history, today is a gift, tomorrow a mystery
title: Tomorrowland: 2012 (Official After Movie)
